member_organisations: http://www.trustindigitallife.eu/ - see carousel at bottom of page
fields_of_interest: Consumers, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
head_office_address: avenue Maurice Dekeyser / Maurice Dekeyserlaan 11 1090 Jette
eu_initiatives: The regulations and initiatives that we actively follow and act upon are eIDAS, GDPR, PSD2, Cybersecurity PPP, Distributed Ledger Technologies, Artificial Intelligence, 5G and the Internet of Things.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: TDL is itself a not-for-profit membership association. We collaborate with Digital Enlightenment Forum and Open Identity Exchange (OIX)
goals__remit: TDL’s mission is to create a trusted ecosystem that protects data and assets of citizens and enterprises through which industry can provide innovative and trustworthy ICT products and solutions across Europe. Our vision is a vibrant digital Europe that benefits both business and citizens and that all have reason to trust.
relevant_communication: Digital Single Market, Startup Europe, PPP, Horizon2020
